sentences.english: "And what are you going to do with the nice new frown?" the Pugilist asked.
sentences.chinese: “那么你打算如何处理好新皱眉？”的拳拳师问道。

sentences.english: The champion was dethroned by a young boxer.
sentences.chinese: 年轻的拳师打败了卫冕冠军。

sentences.english: Newspaper men can't do good work on the THINKING of twenty years ago.
sentences.chinese: 职业拳师不能靠十年前吃的牛排打赢今日的对手。

sentences.english: When women kiss, it always reminds me of prize fighters shaking hands.
sentences.chinese: 当女性接吻之际，常使我想起职业拳师们的握手礼。

sentences.english: I' m sure he' ll make a master boxer.
sentences.chinese: 我相信他会成为一名身手不凡的拳师。

sentences.english: Pugilist met the Moral Sentiment of the Community, who was carrying a hat-box.
sentences.chinese: 阿拳拳师会见了共同体，谁是带着帽盒的道德情感。

sentences.english: I'm sure he'll make a master boxer.
sentences.chinese: 我相信他会成为一名身手不凡的拳师。

sentences.english: "What have you in the hat-box, my friend?" inquired the Pugilist.
sentences.chinese: “什么都在帽盒你，我的朋友？”询问拳拳师。

definition: Ba Ji Quan "Eight Extremes Fist" - Martial Art
Wing Chun/same as 詠春拳|咏春拳[yong3 chun1 quan2]/Yongchun - "Singing Spring Fist" (Chinese martial art)

military skill or technique (in former times)/all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)/self-defense/tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)/also called kungfu 功夫/CL:種|种[zhong3]
Jeet Kun Do or Way of the Intercepting Fist, a fusion of Eastern and Western martial arts led by Bruce Lee 李小龍|李小龙[Li3 Xiao3 long2]
Paochui - "Three Emperor Cannon Punch" (Chinese Martial Art)
the Shaolin monastery and martial arts school
